props.disableInitialSort: Disable default sorting on initial render
props.expand: Designates the table as containing rows that are expandable
props.filter: The function used for filtering items
props.itemKey: The field in the item object that designates a unique key
props.mustSort: Forces at least one column to always be sorted instead of toggling between **sorted ascending** / **sorted descending** / **unsorted** states
props.nextIcon: The displayed icon for forcing pagination to the next page
props.noResultsText: Display text when there are no filtered results
props.pagination: Used to control pagination and sorting from outside the data table. Can also be used to set default sorted column
props.prevIcon: The displayed icon for forcing pagination to the previous page
props.rowsPerPageItems: The default values for the rows-per-page dropdown
props.rowsPerPageText: The default rows per page text
props.search: The search model for filtering results
props.selectAll: Adds header row select all checkbox. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the button, or a Boolean (which uses the default color)
props.totalItems: Manually sets total number of row items, which disables built-in sort and pagination. Used together with pagination prop to enable server-side sort and pagination

slots.actions-append: Slot to put custom elements before the actions in the footer.
slots.actions-prepend: Slot to put custom elements after the actions in the footer.
slots.footer: Slot to specify an extra footer
slots.noData: Displayed when there are no items (takes precedence over `no-results`)
slots.noResults: Displayed when there are no filtered items

scopedSlots.items: Slot to specify how items are rendered
scopedSlots.pageText: Slot to customize the page text region of the pagination controls.
